lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Because sharing is necessary to effect change in the world. Making a loan & relending, will allow others, once it is repaid, to be supported from a one time gift.

lender.name: anne
lender.loan_because: our son gave us the opportunity to become involved in kiva by giving us gift certificates for Christmas. it's fun to check in on our 2 farmers to see how they are progressing over time. we had friends who worked and lived in tajikistan for several years and it's especially gratifying to participate in that economy now.

lender.name: Gensler
lender.occupational_info: we believe in: -the power of design to transform organizations and improve people's lives -the value of a multi-disciplinary approach to enable discovery and innovation -the wisdom of ideas from around the world to enrich our firm and our work

lender.name: Sayako
lender.loan_because: I thought it really cool and innovative. I have never thought that there is such a way to connect myself to the people in the world, striving to change their lives.
lender.occupational_info:
I am currently studying at United Nations mandated University for Peace in Costa Rica. I got to know about Kiva through my favorite seminar on Social Entreprenurship.
If you're interested in what i am pursuing here, please check out my blog, though all written in Japanese!

lender.name: Browne School
lender.loan_because: We learned about the economic problems in different places around the world and decided to help!
lender.occupational_info: Learning how we contribute as members of a global society.

lender.name: Mat
lender.loan_because: I like to know I make a difference to someone in the world. A little change now will make a big change in the future.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with life and family.
lender.occupational_info: I perform popular songs for public and private events.

lender.name: Sheena
lender.loan_because: I want to help empower women...

lender.name: John and Laurel
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate to live in Canada and are happy to be able to help people who are less fortunate and willing to provide for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a beautiful resort here on Vancouver Island (www.sunriseresortparksville.ca) selling Fractional Real Estate. Laurel works at Little Qualicum Cheeseworks making and selling wine and cheese. Yum!

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: As a teacher, I push my students to be difference makers and what a hypocrite I would be if I didn't make a small effort myself!

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I admire the entrepreneurs on this site, and want to help them in some small way.

lender.name: Liz and Gabe
lender.occupational_info: Gabe teaches Spanish & Liz plays viola.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: It's right.
lender.occupational_info: I work to create financial instruments for people who wish to invest (or protect their investment) in the global marketplace.

lender.name: Carie
lender.loan_because: everyone with a dream and the desire to own a business should have the chance to do it!
lender.occupational_info: I am a mortgage broker: I arrange financing so people can have the money they need to buy a house of their own.

lender.name: Barb
lender.loan_because: I Believe in paying it forward. It feels good to know your helping by allowing others to help themselves.

lender.name: Social Entrepreneurship class
lender.occupational_info: Through a campus-wide project in Berea College, the team fundraised for small businesses in developing countries, educated students and community people about poverty situation in the world, promoted the Kiva organization, and empowered individuals to get involved to address the problem. We really showed them how easy and simple it was to make a difference. We raised a total of $1,200 and made loans to 74 businesses in over 25 countries to date.

lender.name: WYO GIRLZ
lender.loan_because: We loan because we believe in helping others help themselves. This is our Christmas gift to eachother.

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: I think this is an amazing way to help with poverty around the world. To get people self supporting and helping their neighbors is simply wonderful and I want to be a part of this.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a nurse for many years and I love it. I worked for a long time in an indigent hospital and learned first hand the many obstacles people face in trying to climb out of poverty.

lender.name: Erick and Cynthia
lender.loan_because: We want to help make a difference in other people's lives. Sharing is rewarding, and we hope that we are not only able to help support those striving to reach their personal goals--we also want to send love and encouragement their way. We are helping others get ahead and we're cheerleading all the while. This is a great way to make a positive influence--literally from one person or family to another. This is what it's all about. We'll continue to be involved.
lender.occupational_info: Erick is a general contractor and has his own painting & construction business. He also is a ceramicist. Cynthia teaches English as a Second Language at a college in Southern California. She loves to read, cook, and travel. They have an "almost five" year old son who keeps them very busy.

lender.name: Eric from Chicago
lender.loan_because: micro-loans work

lender.name: Christa
lender.loan_because: I was given a life of opportunity, and I want to share the blessings i have received. I recognize that i could have been born in the same position as any of these women, and i would pray someone would do the same for me.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: My small contribution may help someone break the poverty cycle & provide for their family & community through their own hard work
lender.occupational_info: I help my airline sell tickets to people who need or want to travel between countries

lender.name: Biglets
lender.loan_because: When we grow up, we want the world to be a better place than it is now.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: Just a little can do a lot, over and over. Besides, it just feels good to do good.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a group of people who maintain all of the company's computer equipment and data. Together our efforts ensure that all of the company's business processes are running as they should be.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Although I have the opportunity to help people one on one with my medical practice, I feel like there is a great opportunity to improve things at a local level in other countries with the advantages I've been given.
lender.occupational_info: I help take care of patients with infections, mostly patients who are hospitalized, but also patients with hepatitis and HIV on an outpatient basis.

lender.name: The DeSilva Family
lender.loan_because: There are so many people in this world in need of help and we believe those in a position to provide that help need to do so. We also love the fact that the people we can help here aren't victims of usury.
lender.occupational_info: Trina: Student and Makeup Artist Matt: Website Development (My purpose is to provide a positive message to those seeking their life purpose or spiritual/personal growth) Haven: Student and Artist

lender.name: Kirsty
lender.loan_because: I am able to

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: What a nice way to help others! It is also a great way to show my children, nieces, nephews & Godchildren how they can make a difference in the lives of others.

lender.name: Laura
lender.occupational_info: I am at a university where I am getting my master's degree and teaching students how to sing. I sing opera and love it.

lender.name: Kiva Stories
lender.loan_because: I believe it is vital to helping make people's lives around the globe a brighter place.
lender.occupational_info: I develop websites to help people sell wood products on the internet.

lender.name: Michelle & Paul
lender.loan_because: So much of the world has so little. We want to make a difference in the lives of others.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: The inequality in the world is staggering but by chance I was born in a wealthy country. I am excited about this opportunity to help people develop their projects.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently a student in a resource management program. In addition I run a small publishing company focused on mountain guidebooks for southwest British Columbia.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I work for the Dutch Postcode Lottery. A charity-lottery that donates 50% of each lottery ticket to numerous charity organisations. 220 million euros last year; 2.3 billion euros since 1998. Last Christmass, all employees received a gift certificate of Kiva. It's a wonderful way to personally get involved!

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I admire these people for taking initiative in running a business. I admire that they have taken time, not only to educate themselves, but better themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I make web pages on the internet.

lender.name: Susan
lender.occupation: Child Development and Human Relations Associate
lender.loan_because: I'd like to make the world a better place for everyone.

lender.name: Vilma & Gonalo
lender.loan_because: We are all the same! Beautiful! :)

lender.name: Kenvin
lender.loan_because: to do something
lender.occupational_info: diffuse the popular education about EC

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I can and I care

lender.name: Siti
lender.loan_because: it's great to be able to make a positive difference in someone's life - to help her be independent and contribute to her community.
lender.occupational_info: I am a customer service officer in a bank, serving mostly multinational companies.

lender.name: LIJAH
lender.loan_because: I LOAN BECAUSE I NEED THE MONEY TO SUPPORT MY COMMUNITY
lender.occupational_info: SELLING OF CLOTHES, TEXTILES MATERIALS AND CHILDREN CLOTHES

lender.name: Iyanna
lender.loan_because: Because I can. Why wouldn't I?

lender.name: Anika
lender.loan_because: I believe everybody can help somebody
lender.occupational_info: I educate people about natural medicine so they can achieve a healthy balance in their diet & lifestyle :-)

lender.name: DR. ROBERT
lender.loan_because: I WANT TO OPEN A EAR NOSE AND THROAT CLINIC IN MY COMMUNITY TO HELP THE POOR
lender.occupational_info: EAR NOSE AND THROAT DOCTOR

lender.name: Bruno
lender.whereabouts: Venda do Pinheiro Venda do Pinheiro

lender.name: hezy
lender.occupational_info: Scientific research

lender.name: Rich
lender.loan_because: This organization gives me the opportunity to loan money to people who need it more than I do, in parts of the world I can only dream of visiting.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a photographer.

lender.name: Chad
lender.occupational_info: "Mister!", he said with a sawdusty sneeze, "I am the Lorax, I speak for the trees. I speak for the trees, for the trees have no tongues, And I'm asking you, sir, at the top of my lungs"

lender.name: Bobadillas
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance

lender.name: memoreks
lender.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic idea. Successful economies are built upon credit and financial trust, so I believe this is an ideal way of grassroots businesses getting the finances they need while ensuring financial discipline and business ethics.
lender.occupational_info: I am an IT Software Consultant for a large multinational software / hardware company.

lender.name: Julia
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to small children.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: I think it is exciting to help those who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with families that have infants and toddlers with disabilities. It's called Early Intervention. My agency provides services to the children and their parents, so that life may be better for them as they grow up.

lender.name: Nurkhodzha
lender.loan_because: Starting with a small business. And I begin to give those in need. I sell phone and acsesories!
lender.occupational_info: Starting with a small business. And I begin to give those in need

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I know that I couldn't have got to where I am now without the help and support of others. I also know I am not going to be able to get where I want to be without more help. So in turn, I want to help others in the same way, to reach their potential. Getting and giving is a cycle, and I believe you need to do both to be fulfilled.
lender.occupational_info: I have started a beverage company, initially looking at emerging markets such as India. Over time, I can see my companies employing, helping and improving the lives of a lot of people.

lender.name: Kazuyuki
lender.loan_because: I'm interested in the peer to peer communication over the country.
lender.occupational_info: software development on computer aided design

lender.name: rjan
lender.loan_because: its fun
lender.occupational_info: research about greenhouse gas emissions

lender.name: Lynda
lender.loan_because: This is an opportunity to do good.

lender.name: Leila
lender.occupational_info: I'm researcher at Department of Applied Economics of the Free University of Brussels and I work on gender issues. The purpose of my project is to study the effect of young children on labour market participation and employment patterns of parents - both mothers and fathers - and their implication in terms of employment and social policies, intra-household time allocation and externalisation of care and domestic work thereby creating new labour market challenges.

lender.name: Workshop
lender.loan_because: We are interested in helping other entrepreneurs (like our self) to make a better future for them self and their families
lender.occupational_info: We are a successful company in the recruitment and employment industry.

lender.name: Virgil & Karen
lender.loan_because: We wanted t be a Blessing to others.

lender.name: Graeme
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a little help

lender.name: Katie G.
lender.loan_because: It feels right.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I can and I should.

lender.name: Brette
lender.loan_because: I have a responsibility to sow in the world so that there are resources available for all.
lender.occupational_info: I work to deliver insurance products to group and individual customers.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe that we are all here to serve one another in one way or another. Kiva gives an excellent opportunity for us to use some of our excess cash to help people pick themselves up or raise their lives and standard of living. Loaning is perfect because it preserves capital while still enabling the less fortunate. Where possible, I think a soft loan is much better than a donation, because it gives the receiver an incentive to actually help themselves and put in effort and value their creation, because they know they will need to pay back the loan. And this also gives me personal satisfaction, knowing that someone somewhere is smiling and happy because they can now do what they wanted to do, now that they have the money. It is giving hope to a person, and that spreads on through out the whole community in a chain reaction. I love it!
lender.occupational_info: Life coaching. I show people how to get what they want in life. That is my a area of work. I also do other businesses and invest in real estate.

lender.name: stephanie
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people a chance to create their own success
lender.occupational_info: I help raise money to help educate and advocate for the increased use of non-motorized transportation.

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: because I believe the good we do in the world comes back to us tenfold, and I have been blessed in many ways.

lender.name: Chuck and Roni
lender.loan_because: I would like to repay the kindness that everyone has given me....I know that isnt possible but this is a good start.
lender.occupational_info: FUN!!! Designing New Aircraft Carriers. Roni......Makes Me Laugh!

lender.name: Miriam
lender.loan_because: I GIVE loans as presents. It's the gift that keeps on giving.

lender.name: Guillermo
lender.loan_because: it's a way to directly help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer and work in a media company.

lender.name: sharon
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves hope and a chance for a better life.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: it was a gift, but i loan because i want to see change.
lender.occupational_info:
i make the best wallets in the world
www.dbclay.com

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of making a difference for someone halfway around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help our customers install software to keep track of patients' medical records online (instead of on paper).

lender.name: Rohit
lender.loan_because: I am interested in supporting small business owners and microenterprises.
lender.occupational_info: I work in finance doing similar work for much larger organizations and people

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I know that I'm privileged.
lender.occupational_info: I hope I can get a nursing job after school to pay back my student loans.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: I love the thought of someone getting some help in order to help themselves. Changing lives and making the world a better place for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I am the director of a children's home.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I love that the collective effort of these small actions can so readily add up and truly make a difference in peoples lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help to keep the internet on!! :>

lender.name: Kassidy
lender.occupational_info: I provide counseling and crisis intervention to children ages 3-12 in their elementary school.

lender.name: Divine Journey
lender.loan_because: Its through helping we realize love for humanity.
lender.occupational_info: We have people from different occupations who decided to come together in this worthy service.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: I want to help empower women around the world who are less fortunate than I am. I hope to someday see all women able to have the self esteem and self sufficiency to provide for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a pension consultant. I help people save money so they don't have to work when they're very old.

lender.name: Hilary
lender.loan_because: I see this as a way to empower people to have control over their own lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a charity which helps support people who are at risk of losing their homes. We advise on benefit entitlement and debt issues.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: I believe in people. I enjoy seeing entrepreneurial spirit. Succeeding in business is hard work, and I hope to help them raise capital.
lender.occupational_info: Manage all information systems for a corporation with 4000 employees.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: we all deserve a chance to make our own way in this life...and we all need a little help to make it happen.
lender.occupational_info: Long, envigorating and important. Kids are our future.

lender.name: Kali
lender.loan_because: i feel its right to give to the less fortunate

lender.name: Brent
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who are hungry for life.
lender.occupational_info: Everything's a blessing in disguise!

lender.name: Lydia
lender.loan_because: Galatians 6:10 - Really, then, as long as we have time favorable for it, let us work what is good toward all, ...

lender.name: Pam & Cynthia
lender.loan_because: The opportunity to help those less fortunate than us to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We help people buy and sell homes.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I research and write grant proposals.

lender.name: O-Team
lender.loan_because: we want to make the world a better place by helping people help themselves

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. It's also an affirming gesture to those who doubt that Americans really do care for people worldwide.
lender.occupational_info: I am a web site designer and run several successful affiliate programs, with subscribers world-wide.

lender.name: Sly
lender.loan_because: It gives the possibility to people to take their future in their hands, and everybody deserves that chance.

lender.name: Rolando
lender.loan_because: Capitalism is good
lender.occupational_info: I get paid to travel the world...

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place to live.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to help.

lender.name: Corn
lender.occupational_info: Programming websites.

lender.name: Baron
lender.loan_because: I loan because I want to help people grow their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I am in 4th grade in Los Angeles, California. I like playing baseball and riding my bicycle.

lender.name: Flavio
lender.loan_because: Is there any reason not to? What is 25 US dollars (17 euros)?

lender.name: Beatriz
lender.loan_because: I believe that small actions can cause great inpactos

lender.name: Dhesie
lender.loan_because: I want to give more.

lender.name: Cassandra
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a difference and help others reach their goals

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.

lender.name: Corby
lender.loan_because:
We all need to help eachother out. Life should be enjoyable and comfortable for all.
I can only hope to set a positive role that others will follow.
If not? At least I was able to make a difference in a few peoples lives.

lender.name: Chris
lender.occupation: Director of Youth and Family Ministry
lender.loan_because: My dad was self-employed when I was a child and I know how hard it can be to get a business started. It is only right that I do what I can to help someone get off the ground and provide for their family.
lender.occupational_info: I work with Youth and Families talking about what it is that God is calling them to do. Part of that calling is to care for our neighbor.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: Lending increases self-worth, improves relations and is an easy thing to do. And poverty is a horrible thing.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Canada's National Broadcaster (CBC) and I help them improve their service to their customers on the web.

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: the world's a better place when we remember the golden rule.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I believe that investing in a community is the best way to help that community.
lender.occupational_info: I write financial computer software.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great and easy way to get involved in helping other peoples lives. It's a new way of thinking what to do with that extra 25 bucks in your wallet you know you are gonna waste.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to be the change I wish to see in the world.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I think it's the right thing to do. Sure, giving a handout from time to time is OK, but giving a helping hand allows people to take charge of their own destiny and self-respect.
lender.occupational_info: I just graduated from the University of Illinois at Chicago with a degree in anthropology. I am interested in archaeology and prehistoric cultures, especially their art. At the moment, I am looking for a job, and I plan to return to university in a year or so to continue my studies.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I am living proof that employment is the greatest hand up to escape poverty. It makes sense that loans to build a business not only benefit the entrepreneur but also those who will be employed by the new business, and the community as a whole.

lender.name: Gene
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I cut up livestock for food

lender.name: Chez
lender.loan_because: you must be the change you wish to see in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school Spanish teacher

lender.name: Yunmi
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to live out their dreams and hope for a better future.
lender.occupational_info:
I work in Human Resources. Part of my work is developing strategies and outreach activities to find the most talented individuals to work for a company. I make sure that both employees and employers are being treated fairly and are respecting state, federal and local employment/labor laws.
I develop people's skills once they join the company to help further their professional goals as well as the company's goals. Simply put: I care about people.

lender.name: Heike
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to make a positive difference in someone else's life. I have been blessed with a healthy and caring family, and a good life and I am thankful that I can help others.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work in import/export

lender.name: David & Jessica
lender.loan_because: We are all on this crazy ride of life together. It's our duty to help each other out. You get one chance on the ride.
lender.occupational_info:
David - I sell software to very large businesses. I help these businesses become more productive.
Jessica - I am a Sales Manger for AT&T.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: "Freedom in economic arrangements is itself a component of freedom broadly understood, so economic freedom is an end in itself..." -Milton Friedman 1962
lender.occupational_info: I create art. Art isn't necessary for survival, but it is necessary for living in a meaningful way.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: much has been given to me, and so I give to others
lender.occupational_info: I help University students make decisions about their education.

lender.name: Brock
lender.loan_because: the needs of the many outweigh the needs of the few
lender.occupational_info: Emergency Services

lender.name: Hlio
lender.occupational_info: I met KIVA through a report of the Magazine he/she Sees, and soon I was interested, therefore my dream always went to acquire a cutting ploter, because I work with sticker and as I don't have a ploter, I pay for third they make the cutting. My work is simple with stickers of all the types, and a cutting ploter it would help me to transform my small business in a quite profitable business, I hope to count with the support of some entrepreneur for me to can about thousands of pesoas to do part of this select group of people that you/they are helped by Kiva. Being thanks like this the opportunity. hugs Helio

lender.name: Kimberlee
lender.loan_because: I've been at the bottom even in the wealth of the US and I know without a hand UP, I would've gone hungry
lender.occupational_info: I sell second hand items on the internet to people all over the world

lender.name: Pierre Jones
lender.loan_because: I think that people who work for a living but are still unable to support their family should be provided with sufficient funds to grow and reach an acceptable level so that they can be proud of working and earning their keep. Which is what I believe any self respecting individual wants on this planet.
lender.occupational_info: I help developing countries establish and improve their transportation infrastructure so that they can be less dependent on only local markets and improve their market share on the planet.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: What we put out in the universe eventually returns to us.

lender.name: Diana
lender.occupational_info: I work for a credit union and lend money to people for cars, houses, and personal use.

lender.name: Lora
lender.loan_because: This is one of the best ways to help someone better themselves. Its exciting to see others thrive. Just a few dollars can go a long way in changing the lives of people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a supervisor in an anatomic pathology laboratory.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I am happy to be able to help.

lender.name: Larissa
lender.loan_because: I like to think I'm helping change the world, even if just a little bit.

lender.name: Sharon and Fred
lender.loan_because: Kiva loans are making such a positive impact in countries all around the globe. We are happy to be able to participate in such a grass roots effort.

lender.name: Joe & Sarah
lender.loan_because: I've realized how fortunate we are within the world. After traveling all around, you appreciate the individual struggles throughout.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people who work hard to grow their business and provide for their families.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: It is an easy way to give back to people far less fortunate then me or anyone I know.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find the homes of their dream by showing them homes that people are selling. I also help people sell their homes to buyer's.

lender.name: Bernie
lender.loan_because: Free Enterprise needs capital and often it can be hard to come by and is generally misapplied in todays capital markets. More retail shopping centers?
lender.occupational_info: I try to find a balance between buying and selling stuff to meet my debts and obligations and still have a life.

lender.name: Annelise
lender.loan_because: I want to help people be successful and proud.

lender.name: Dianne, Maryland USA
lender.loan_because: I like to support creative people
lender.occupational_info: I am a photographer of performers and models. I also do hair & makeup and love to make people feel beautiful.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit. I suspect that most of these folks embody a kind of initiative, imagination, and work ethic that is the wealth of their community. Furthermore, it's not easy to go before a bank or a group of total strangers to ask for a loan.

lender.name: Sandi
lender.loan_because: I grew up poor and know how much it means to be able to earn a living by one's own efforts.
lender.occupational_info: I teach adults how to read and write and speak in English.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I don't need the money

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: i can.

lender.name: Cristine
lender.loan_because: We can make a difference for a better world, one dollar at a time!
lender.occupational_info: I resolve peoples problems by selling auto parts overseas.

lender.name: Jay & Lisa
lender.loan_because: In our hearts we want to change the world, from the inside out.
lender.occupational_info: We both work for Canadian companies. Lisa works for a large Canadian organization called Canadian Tire, where she helps design stores that customers shop in. Jay works in a marketing company that works on and develops commercials and videos.

lender.name: Altis
lender.loan_because: thankfully I can. I have been blessed and am able to afford helping someone else in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Spanish teacher who makes jewlery to make a little extra money. It's with that money that I want to loan to Kiva participants.

lender.name: james
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do. I am self employed and know what its like to try and do business. These ppl don't ask for donations, they are asking for loans ! If one defaults (which isn't likely), it won't break me. Philanthropy is a way of life, it makes you feel just a bit better about yourself. Try it ! I want to teach my children how lucky we are to live in a great country and how good it is to share with ppl less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Too complicated, but I service the automotive, aerospace and machining industry.

lender.name: Albert & Lorna
lender.loan_because: Jesus called us to minister to "the least of these." To whom much is given, much is required. We are simply passing the blessing along.

lender.name: Marion, Rinia and Lex
lender.loan_because: We feel deeply touched by and connected with the people we lend to. Kiva opens a unique window on the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are all retired; Marion spends a lot of time with the grandchildren (4 - 13 years old). They have chickens and a vegetable and flower garden. Marion and Lex volunteer in church and in a nearby park. Lex writes a book on trees in Liberia (West Africa). Rinia is supporting old friends with health issues.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: People deserve a chance. I have been given many, and it's time to give back.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to make cars and trucks attractive to look at and safe to drive.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: Kivo provides me an opportunity to circulate the abundance with which I have been blessed.
lender.occupational_info: Through coaching, I inspire others to live authentically, to achieve principled success and to make a positive difference in the world. I aim to live by my motto, "Discover who you are. Decide what's important. Do what matters." Lending to Kivo matters to me.

lender.name: Beth and Grant
lender.loan_because: we're fortunate and we want to share our good fortune

lender.name: Zachary
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to be born into an environment where I am able to accrue surplus capitol.
lender.occupational_info: I have a natural penchant for empathy...

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with so much in my life, I feel it's only right to help those who have not been so fortunate.

lender.name: Franoise
lender.loan_because: my employer gave us the $25.00 for the cause, and I learn about it in Today on NBC. I think it's a very terrific idea.
lender.occupational_info: My work is framing arts, photos, needleworks, posters, and every- things you can imaging. I have been doing it for 21 years.

lender.name: Tres Putas
lender.loan_because: I loan to help others succeed.

lender.name: M & T
lender.loan_because: We want to change the world!

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I am greatful for all my blessings and think it is important to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I help people improve their lives through investment in real estate.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I like making other people happy.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: It is the most worthwhile thing I can think of to do with my money. $25 could take me out to lunch, or it could help take someone out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the executive office of a Planned Parenthood affiliate, raising money and awareness to ensure that women will always have access to safe, responsible reproductive health care.

lender.name: preeti
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a US bank managing its risk.

lender.name: LaKeisha
lender.loan_because: I have been to Africa and know the economic hardship of both men and women. I also feel that as a African American, it is my responsibility to help Africa.
lender.occupational_info: I teach literature at a college.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.occupation: mother of two and church organist

lender.name: Rugby
lender.loan_because: Every woman should have the chance to better her life.

lender.name: Lea Ann and Bernie
lender.loan_because: Elisa Chen gives great Christmas presents.
lender.occupational_info: Lea Ann gives people pills. Bernie uses money to make money.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: God has blessed my life and I want to be a blessing to others.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs that help people manage large amounts of banking information.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I want to help worthy people succeed.

lender.name: Yury & Marcie
lender.loan_because: I can help.

lender.name: diane
lender.occupation: teacher-but at home now with my 2 small children

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I can. It is the right thing to do. I know that one person can make a difference.

lender.name: Derek
lender.occupational_info: lawyer for a movie studio.

lender.name: Kate, Matt & Mira
lender.loan_because: we can.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: There are many good people that deserve a chance. A small loan is a simple place to start.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: Our connections with other people are the source of true richness in life.
lender.occupational_info: I create the plans and concepts for video games made by computer programmers and artists. I'm currently working with GoPets.net and on a game that helps teach nutrition to kids.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship and the positive effects it can have on individual lives and the communities they are a part of.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a small construction firm that specializes in remodeling and upgrading homes.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I believe it will be a rewarding experience in the long run.
lender.occupational_info: I am a sales manager for a national bedding retailer. I manage my own store and I also train new employees.

lender.name: Clay Alexander
lender.loan_because: I am aiming my career towards social entrepreneurship. This is one way I satisfy my desire to help entrepreneurs worldwide.
lender.occupational_info: As a Chemical Engineer, I apply the principles of chemistry to solve problems in manufacturing. I also promote awareness in chemical manufacturing and chemical safety.

lender.name: DK!
lender.loan_because: I could waste the money on junk food, video games, gambling, or any other vice...or someone else can use it to improve their way of life. The latter sounds better.

lender.name: Beau
lender.loan_because: I love that Kiva empowers people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Paramedic in an Australian ambulance service.

lender.name: Paula Kivafriends.org
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference to an individual. Sometimes all it takes is someone to give you a chance to make your life better for yourself and your family. I want to be able to provide someone with that chance.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a technical consultant for a computer firm. The company I work for designs, installs and support computer networks for businesses around New Zealand.

lender.name: Adriano Esposito
lender.loan_because: The international aids from governments cannot go to people as well as the aid provided by Kiva and its partners. And I think we inhabitants of the so-called civilized world have a duty, and an opportunity, to help those who, despite their bad leaders, want to improve his condition and those of the country where he lives. It 'a great opportunity for everyone!
lender.occupational_info: I program and manage information systems

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: money is like manure Its only any good when its spread around

lender.name: Trond E.
lender.occupational_info: Working in an NGO for children and youth organisations.

lender.name: rajan
lender.loan_because: Want to help my parents and wife and child. Wants to start a compute r retail shop.
lender.occupational_info: i m working as a software programmer in chennai, india.

lender.name: Cludia & Nuno
lender.loan_because: We believe we can eliminate poverty by giving tools to those who need.

lender.name: Andr
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference...
lender.occupational_info: I am a video editor, cameraman, producer, evs operator, technical...you know!! Working in a small audiovisual company you need to be prepared to do everything!

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: giving people a hand up, not a hand out, just makes sense.
lender.occupational_info: I give advice to people about how to improve their businesses.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I like to visit developing nations, and I have often wondered how can I help those people that are so determined in a nation of limited opportunity. Kiva shows that they play a part in the answer to help these people that WILL succeed. I wanted to be a part of that.
lender.occupational_info: My fitness regime demands dedication, strength and confidence. As a personal trainer I need to be creative, enthusiastic and knowledgeable about healthy lifestyle.

lender.name: Hugo
lender.loan_because: It can make a difference... the motivaton and determination are already there, together we can help overcome that last hurdle.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: a little here, a little there, bits of hope ride the air
lender.occupational_info: artist

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate to live in the US
lender.occupational_info: I'm an IT Lead(computer geek) for a large food service company

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because:
Doing what I can to make the world a better place. :-D
The Orange Effect.
Go HOKIES!!!
lender.occupational_info: Senior Systems Engineer. I write requirements for large computer systems.

lender.name: Bert
lender.loan_because: I feel this is the most activating way of helping. Entrepreneurship CAN make a difference for whole communities, and I'm excited to support this in a modest way.
lender.occupational_info: Online marketing, web development.

lender.name: AJ & Finn
lender.loan_because: microfinancing can change the world, and help my kid grow up to understand our world in a global way. We talk about charitable giving, business and finance (budgeting our money to lend some, starting a business to make money, lending/borrowing/repayment), and world geography, sitting in front of our big map and plotting where we want to lend money next!

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people who want to have their own business and take charge of their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I'm now retired but I had my own small business (like you) for many years.

lender.name: carlos
lender.loan_because:
Gostaria de mais informaes como funciona e como poderamos fazer uma pagina em portugus para podermos ajudar muitas pessoas tambem em nosso pais.
Carlos
lender.occupational_info:
Gostaria de mais informaes como funciona e como poderamos fazer uma pagina em portugus para podermos ajudar muitas pessoas tambem em nosso pais.
Carlos

lender.name: christopher
lender.loan_because: I want to use it to buy and sale cloth
lender.occupational_info: i am married with 2 children, am 33 years old, live in Lagos state,...

lender.name: ODA,Rui
lender.loan_because: leverage gross global happiness through sharing my happiness

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who are less fortunate than me.

lender.name: Mark & Ansley
lender.loan_because: We have been involved in non-profit organizations for 30 years. We wanted to support the micro finance movement world wide.
lender.occupational_info: Mark is a Senior Vice President - Wealth Management for Smith Barney a global financial services firm. He works with a small number of families overseeing the managment of their financial resources. Ansley is President of Callaway & Company, LLC a financial consulting firm working with Family Law Attorneys

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I want to pay forward the gifts I've been given.
lender.occupational_info: I take pictures and plan video productions for various companies

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: "If you teach someone how to fish, they will not go hungry."
